title: Don’t give her any ideas
author: VD
content_html:
An NRO reader from New Orleans shares an ominous thought:

Louisiana’s Democratic Governor has been a miserable failure where it matters most – rallying the citizens. As my brother put it, “I have a mother. I need a Governor.” What that means about Americans’ view of women in top leadership positions now I dont know, but if I were Hillary, I would go to New Orleans and shoot some looters on national television.

She’s probably too stuffed after spending the last two days swimming around and devouring people with the other giant lizards.
